name: Ami's Room
description:
A boy named Pierre refuses to leave his room.

He sleeps to access dreams where his sister, Ami, escaped to after a traumatic event.

Pierre believes that if he locates Ami by a slim chance, he’ll be able to convince her
to wake up with him.

♢♢♢♢♢

An exploration game set in a surreal dreamscape full of projections.
Piece together past recollections and elusive memories to find the story.
Make a choice as the line between the real and the dreamed world begins to blur.
The key lies in your hands… but would you choose to wake up?

Features

  • Transverse between different dreams.
  • Solve puzzles to obtain answers.
  • Talk to those inhabiting the dreamworld.
  • Avoid monsters who try to keep you asleep.
  • When the time comes, remember.
  • ...or forget?

This game contains depictions and/or descriptions of depression and anxiety.
It may not be suitable for all audiences and viewer discretion is advised.
